A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There was much anticipation with this movie\, and the director certainly delivered a lot of nostalgia throughout the movie. I enjoyed the movie\, however. At times\, the movie felt incoherent\, and the screenwriter was reluctant to optimize the full potential of Mark Hamill\, Daisy Ridley\, and Adam Driver. With the allotted time of 152 minutes\, I hoped for better continuity with character development. Overall\, this movie captured the essence of the Star Wars franchise!
